timeline.content:
Hey uxue, 

Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London! I am Prachi and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. 

Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

Hi Uxue, good morning!
This is Prachi from AmberStudent. We’re partnered with University College London to assist with accommodation, and we’ve received your booking form for Stapleton House, London.

However, we’re currently missing the guarantor details required to proceed. Could you please share the following information with us here on WhatsApp so we can move forward and complete your booking?

Full name

Phone number

Email address

Date of birth

Relationship to you

Full address

Gender

If you have any questions or need more details about the property, feel free to ask. I’m here to help!

timeline.content: Hi, yes I am still interested. However, when I received a UCL email regarding accommodation with Unite Students it mentioned a 10% discount hence I was wondering whether as UCL student I receive this discount. When I attempted to pay the discount was not applied and it did not allow me to insert it. Kind fegards

timeline.content:
Hello, good afternoon!
Hope you're doing well.

Just wanted to update you that the property is currently offering a £400 cashback on bookings. The offer you mentioned was a previous one provided by the property, but it has now been replaced with this new £400 cashback offer.

Hello,
Good afternoon!

I hope you're doing well. Have you made a decision yet?

If you’d like to proceed with the booking for Stapleton House, London, please share the guarantor details at your earliest convenience. We’ll need the following information to move forward, as it’s not included in your current booking form:

Full Name

Contact Number

Email Address

Date of Birth

Relationship to You

Gender

Full Address

We need to submit this information to the property team, so please try to decide soon. the rooms are getting booked quickly.
